=== ID ===
The User Story id.

=== Description ===
A short description of the User Story.

=== How to Demo ===
Links, screenshots, sources and explanations to see easily and quickly the results of the User Story.

=== Imp. ===
Importance.
-1: no evaluation yet.

=== Est. ===
Estimation in hours.
0: no evaluation yet.

=== Elaps. ===
Elapsed time since the User Story has been started.

=== Owner ===
Developer who is plan to work, is working or has worked on the User Story.
Use _All_ if everybody has worked on.

=== Sprint ===
The completion sprint.

=== Status ===
Can take 4 values:
 * http://fabienrenaud.com/gatech/success.gif _Completed_
 * http://fabienrenaud.com/gatech/star-gold.png _Work in Progress_
 * http://fabienrenaud.com/gatech/star-white.png _Standby_
 * http://fabienrenaud.com/gatech/warning.gif _Canceled or Postponed_
